caption.p: Environmental parameters during the breeding season: ( a) Sea-ice concentration (SIC, solid line), ( b) Sea surface temperature (SST, dotted line) and ( c) wind speed (dashed line) during summer in the vicinity of the studied colony, from remote sensing data. ( d) Mean mercury concentration of body feathers representing summer contamination (solid line and black dots). SIC was negatively linked with both SST (n = 12, R² = 0.74, p < 0.001, y = −6.1x + 13.6) and wind speed (n = 8, R² = 0.57, p = 0.03, y = −1.3x + 42.9) but was not linked with summer Hg contamination (n = 8, p > 0.1).
